p:
The collected supernatants from stimulated and non-stimulated neutrophils were used to evaluate cytokine production (IL-8, TNF-α and IL-1β) using enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. In the last step of the test, absorbance at 450 and 570 nm was read using a plate reader (BioTek). Urolithin A at the concentration 5, 10 and 40 µM and roscovitine at 40 μM were used as a pure compounds negative controls
36, 37 .
